moderation.title: Moderation
moderation.showAdultContentDescription:
Show adult content without warnings. 
If this is set, adult content marked as 18+ will be shown to you without any warnings and prompts for confirmation.
moderation.showAdultContentWarning: By checking this setting you confirm that you are have reached the age of majority in your country (18 years in most countries).
moderation.blacklistedTagsDescription: List of tags that you do not wish to see.
moderation.blacklistedTagsPlaceholder: Each tag name on the new line

booksCensoring.title: Books censoring mode
booksCensoring.description: Method of censoring adult books or books that contain blacklisted tags.
booksCensoring.noneDescription: Do nothing. Keep adult books and books with blacklisted tags visible. But you will still get a warning when opening it.
booksCensoring.censorDescription: Blurs books that contain blacklisted tags or are adult
booksCensoring.hideDescription: Hide books from search results if they contain blacklisted tags

privacy.hideComments: Hide your comments from your profile
privacy.hideCommentsDescription: Hides your comments from your profile. People can still see your comments in books/chapter where you posted them.
privacy.hideFavoritesDescription: Hides list and number of your favorite books from your profile.
privacy.hideEmail: Hide your email from your profile
privacy.hideStatsDescription: Hides your account stats (number of followers and followed users).
privacy.allowSearch: Allow to search for your account
privacy.allowSearchDescription: Allows to search for your account. If this setting is enabled then you can be found through search. If disabled, your account can only be found directly.
